title: Replace footer attribution from 'Caffeine.ai' to 'by Nav'

requirements.summary: Replace the 'using Caffeine.ai' attribution text in the Footer component with 'by Nav'
acceptanceCriteria: The Footer component displays 'by Nav' instead of 'using Caffeine.ai'
The text styling and positioning remain consistent with the existing design
The attribution text maintains the same gold color and fade-in animation as before

file_operations.description: Update the attribution text from 'using Caffeine.ai' to 'by Nav' while maintaining all existing styling including gold color, fade-in animation, and layout positioning
